name: hotred-theme
description: The Ruby Red theme is a visual burst of energy with vibrant shades of red, creating a stimulating atmosphere for your coding environments in Visual Studio Code. This theme is designed to deliver a dynamic and engaging coding experience, highlighting key elements with deep red tones and complementing them with subtle nuances for comfortable readability. Comments appear in a muted shade of gray, while keywords and variables stand out in intense red, providing a modern and distinctive aesthetic. If you seek a coding environment that inspires passion and focus, the Ruby Red theme is the perfect choice for you.
